description: Unspecified vulnerability in the JRockit component in BEA Product Suite R27.6.4: JRE/JDK, 1.4.2, 5, and, and 6 allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors.  NOTE: this issue subsumes CVE-2009-2670, CVE-2009-2671, CVE-2009-2672, CVE-2009-2673, CVE-2009-2674, CVE-2009-2675, and CVE-2009-2676.
